examples.text: Vapurun mürettebatından üç ve İspanyollardan 20 kişi yaralanmıştır.
examples.translation: Three from the boat's crew and 20 Spanish people were injured.

etymology: From Arabic مُرَتَّبَات (murattabāt), plural of مُرَتَّب (murattab). Formally, the Arabic plural of mürettep. By surface analysis, mürettep + -at.
